The fire was estimated to be 2,000 acres in size Tuesday, and the overnight flight was the first infrared mapping on the fire. The log’s interpretation of the Robertson Draw Fire says they noted intense heat “throughout much of the perimeter, particular the western part and along the edges and in areas where the fuel type supports larger vegetation. ”
